Title: The Four Seasons
Actors: Alan Alda, Carol Burnett, Len Cariou, Sandy Dennis
Plot: Three middle-aged wealthy couples take vacations together in Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter. Along the way we are treated to mid-life, marital, parental and other crises.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
